message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

I understand you're looking to stay within a budget of $8000, but I have to consider the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10000. Is this a more comfortable price for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $9000 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $9500. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident it's a fair price for the value this product brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product, and that's my final offer. I'm not sure if I can go any lower than that.

I understand you're firm on $9000, but I'm still not getting to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $9700. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand you're trying to reach your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with $9700. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9000 and $9700, which is $9350. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not getting to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get as close as possible to my target. I'm counteroffering at $9500. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to consider other options.

I understand you're making one last concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $9500. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $10000.
